about_the_game:
This add-on extends the base game with an additional coaster style: The Vekoma MK1101. It is a modern and popular coaster style with a sleek design.

Vekoma Rides Manufacturing B.V. granted us an official license to use the product and company names and design for this add-on.

This add-on consists of a new train and track, recreating the real MK1101 coaster type produced by Vekoma Rides Manufacturing B.V.

Features
  • High detailed train with launch/chain lift option. The train's bottom side magnets will be automatically adjusted.
  • High detailed track hardware (friction tire, LSM module, static magnetic brake).
  • Three different track spines (normal, thick, and C-Beam).
  • Cross ties automatically adapt to cutout version on camel backs.
  • Two new parks demonstrating both the LSM launch and the chain lift version.
  • Special horizontal rotating track switch
  • Automatically generated track covers protecting the friction tires from the chain dog in the chain lift version

Next to selecting between launch and chain lift version, the train offers other new options:
  • Optional handrails on front of car
  • Optional vests on restraints
  • Customizable nylon wheel colors
  • Zero car cover can be removed (for scripted custom theming)
  • Other car covers can be removed (for scripted custom theming)

legal_notice: The Vekoma MK1101 is a product of Vekoma Rides Manufacturing B.V.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible (Intel HD Graphics or better)
  • Additional Notes: Intel GMA graphics not supported
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 ore newer, 64 Bit and Apple Silicon supported
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 compatible (discrete AMD Radeon or Apple Silicon)
  • Additional Notes: Fast graphics very important and highly recommended

name: NoLimits 2 Roller Coaster Simulation - Vekoma MK1101

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: NoLimits 2 Roller Coaster Simulation - Vekoma MK1101 - $3.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy NoLimits 2 Roller Coaster Simulation - Vekoma MK1101

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or newer
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.0 (Shader Model 3), min 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVr or Oculus PC. Keyboard or gamepad required.
  • Additional Notes: Good graphics card is very important. Some integrated graphics may be unsupported or too slow.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64 Bit OS strongly recommended)
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 hardware or newer (>= Shader Model 5), 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Fast graphics very important and highly recommended

short_description: This add-on contains an additional coaster style: The Vekoma MK1101. It is a modern and popular coaster type with a sleek design.
